records.name: Four Seasons Resort Maldives At Kuda Huraa

descriptions.direction: Located in Kuda Huraa, Four Seasons Maldives At Kuda Huraa is on the beach. Maldives Islamic Centre and Medhu Ziyaaraiy are local landmarks, and some of the area's activities can be experienced at HP Reef and Jailbreaks Surf Spot. Take an opportunity to explore the area for water adventures such as windsurfing.
descriptions.general: General description: For medical treatment in emergencies there is a hospital around 100 km away. Amenities: It is equipped with a reception (check-in from 14:00, check-out until 12:00). For the meals, there are 4 restaurants. For guests dependent on a wheelchair the accommodation provides a barrier-free access and a number of wheelchair accessible bathrooms. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find 2 pools with a children´s pool. A bar at the pool offers guests refreshing beverages. Meals: Breakfast a la carte. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Tennis (where applicable, for a fee), billiards (where applicable, for a fee), badminton (where applicable, for a fee), darts (where applicable, for a fee), table tennis (where applicable, for a fee) and fitness. Spa area and steam bath available (where applicable for a fee). For the entertainment of young guests there is a children´s play area. Child supervision: activity programme for children, mini club and babysitting (where applicable, for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English. Accepted methods of payment: American Express. Beach Bungalow (Sunset View, Private Pool - Speedboat): With extra bed, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Beach Bungalow (Sunrise View, Private Pool - Speedboat): With extra bed, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 2 Bedroom Royal BeachVilla (Speedboat): With extra bed, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Beach FamilyBungalow (Private Pool - Speedboat): With extra bed, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Water FamilyVilla (Private Pool - Seaplane): With extra bed, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Beach Pavilion (Private Pool - Speedboat): With extra bed, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 2 Bedroom Beach Pavilion (Private Pool - Speedboat): With extra bed, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Deluxe Beach Pavilion (Private Pool - Speedboat): With extra bed, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 2 Bedroom Water Suite (Private Pool - Speedboat): With extra bed, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 3 Bedroom Water Suite (Private Pool - Speedboat): With extra bed, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Water Villa (Sunset View, Private Pool - Speedboat): With extra bed, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Water Villa (Sunrise View, Private Pool - Speedboat): With extra bed, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. ERRATA: Rooms - Action:at annex; Comment:Any rooms available with more than 2 pax. Only 1 extra bed or Rollaway bed or sofa bed will be provided. No Rooms can accommodate more than 1 extra bed.

records.short_description: Excellent wellness hotel. Awesome rooms and service in a great location. Awesome vibe.

Maldives Islamic Centre and Medhu Ziyaaraiy are local landmarks, and some of the area's activities can be experienced at HP Reef and Jailbreaks Surf Spot.
